properties.areaDesc: Pickens, AL; Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 5:24PM CST until January 16 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...
Hale...Marengo and Sumter Counties.
Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...
Hale...Marengo and Sumter Counties.
Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Greene...Hale...
Marengo...Pickens and Sumter Counties.

.Heavy rainfall of over the Tombigbee River drainage basin has led
to significant rises on the river, and a flood warning is now in
effect for much of the Tombigbee River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam.
* from this evening to Thursday morning...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At  4:00 PM Saturday The stage Was 117.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 122.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tonight and continue to rise
to near 127.7 feet by Monday morning. The river will fall below
flood stage by Wednesday night.
* Impact...At 128.0 feet...Cattle in the area should be moved to
higher ground. Flooding of some cabins and camps along the river
can be expected.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Sunday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
